CustomField.formula: IF ((Probability >= 0.00)&&(Probability <= 0.20),'Very Unlikely to occur', IF ((Probability >= 0.21)&&(Probability <= 0.40),'Unlikely to occur', IF ((Probability >= 0.41)&&(Probability <= 0.60),'May Occur about half of the time', IF ((Probability >= 0.61)&&(Probability <= 0.80),'Likely to occur', NULL ))))
CustomField.label: Probability Of Success
